She plans to use this loan of 2000 soles, which she will repay in 6 months, to invest in beauty products and clothing. Irene dreams of opening a bookstore and a clothing store. She belongs to her local mothers' club.

Translated from Spanish by Jill Heske, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: to buy beauty products and clothing

loans.name: Nils

texts.es: Nils tiene 27 años de edad, es casado hace tres años, tiene un hijo, y actualmente viven en la casa de sus padres. Desde niño vio trabajar a sus padres en las labores agrícolas sembrando papas y alverjas, y fue esa labor la que le dio comodidades en su juventud. Desde que formó su propia familia, él y su esposa siembran mayormente alverjas en las tierras prestadas por su padre, lo cual retribuye trabajando en las siembras que realizan sus padres. La alverja es de fácil cultivo y no requiere de mucha inversión, nos dice Nils. Él está muy acostumbrado con la agricultura y no la cambiaria por otra actividad; por ello tiene en mente inscribirse como comunero para poder producir más en lo terrenos cultivables de la comunidad (todos los comuneros trabajan a favor de todos). De ese modo sus cultivos le serán más rentables como las chacras de sus padres. Nils es el secretario de su banco comunal, ya lleva varios ciclos consecutivos con ese cargo, este es su 7mo ciclo de crédito con MFP donde viene trabajando con mucha responsabilidad, tanto en los pagos, como con las responsabilidades encomendadas. El dinero que solicita es para la compra de fertilizantes para abonar sus siembras de alverjas, y de ese modo coseche antes de lo previsto.
texts.en:
Nils is 27 years old, has been married for three years, has a son and currently lives in his parents’ house. Since he was very young he saw his parents work in agriculture planting potatoes and peas; and it was this livelihood that gave him the comforts of his youth. When he formed his own family, he and his wife planted mostly peas on his father’s land; he returns the favor by working on his parents’ planting. Peas are the easiest crop to grow and do not require much investment, Nils tells us.

He is very accustomed to agriculture and would not change it for another activity; for that reason he focuses his mind on being a good member of his communal bank in order to be able produce more on the cultivable land of the community (all of the communal bank members work with each other). By this his cultivations will be very profitable for him like his father’s crops. Nils is the secretary of his communal bank, and has been so for various consecutive cycles. This is his 7th loan with MFP where he works with a lot of responsibility, in his payments and with the entrusted responsibilities. The money that he solicits is for the purchase of fertilizers for his pea plants, and in turn he will be able to harvest his peas sooner than expected.

Translated from Spanish by Breanne Kochert, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: For the purchase of fertilizers

loans.name: Rayda

texts.es: Rayda tiene 34 años de edad, está casada cerca de 10 años, tiene 5 hijos, todos viven en su casa propia. Se dedica a la agricultura, es una mujer muy perseverante, aunque su esposo no la ayuda tanto como quisiera en estas labores, junto a sus hermanos, siembra en las fechas designadas para las chacras temporales, porque si se pasa de fecha la producción no es del todo buena, el factor del clima, es quien dirige este tipo de siembras. A Rayda le gusta su trabajo, aunque a veces tiene dolores en sus pies que no le permiten desplazarse fácilmente, pero pese a ello, cosecha la papa junto a su esposo. Sus anhelos son de comprar terrenos en zonas de regadío, para que de ese modo no tenga que esperar las fechas de lluvia para el inicio de sus labores agrícolas. Este es su 7mo crédito con MFP, todo este tiempo demostró ser una cliente que paga en las fechas señaladas por su asesor de crédito. El préstamo que solicita es para la compra de alverjas en semilla, ya que tiene sus chacras preparadas para ser sembradas.
texts.en:
Rayda is 34 years old, has been married for close to 10 years, and has 5 children who all live at home. She works in agriculture and is a woman who perseveres, although her husband doesn't help her with the work as much as she would like. Together with her siblings, she plants her plots of land according to the seasons because if she misses a date the production is not so good. It's the climate that dictates this sort of planting. Rayda likes her work, although sometimes she has pains in her feet that don't allow her to move around easily. But even so, she harvests potatoes alongside her husband. Her wish is to buy land in an irrigated area so she won't have to wait for rain to begin her agricultural work. This is her 7th loan with MFP. All this time she has proved to be a client who pays on the dates marked by her loan adviser. The loan she is asking for is to buy pea seeds since she has the plots of land already prepared to be sown.

Translated from Spanish by Shelly Hubman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Compra de semillas de alverja

loans.name: Silvino

texts.es: Silvino, de 35 años de edad, es casado hace 8 años, tiene dos hijos que viven con en su casa. De niño vivía en las alturas de su pueblo donde sus padres cultivaban en tierras temporales, ellos esperaban la lluvia para que la tierra se deje cultivar. Ahora con su propia familia migró al pueblo  de su esposa donde siembra en terrenos de regadío en la parte baja del pueblo. Desde entonces ya no espera los meses de septiembre a octubre para la siembra, sino que cada vez que cosecha papa, siembra alverjas, y en otras chacras ya está preparando para la siembra siguiente de papa. Aunque hay temporadas que el precio de este producto baja en el mercado, cuando sube es muy rentable, por eso Silvino es fiel a este tubérculo y con ello sostiene las necesidades de su familia. Silvino es un cliente muy gracioso cada vez que se reúne con sus compañeros del banco comunal, este es su 7mo préstamo con MFP, donde siempre ha sido un buen pagador. El dinero que solicita es esta ocasión es para la compra de fertilizantes químicos, para abonar sus próximas siembras de papa.
texts.en:
Silvino is 35 years old, has been married for 8 years, and has two children. When he was a boy he lived near a village where his parents were dryland farmers—they would wait for the rain in order to cultivate the land. Once he had his own family Silvino moved to his wife’s village, where he farms on irrigated land below the village. Ever since then he no longer has to wait until the months of September or October to plant (as is the case for dryland farming). Every time Silvino harvests potatoes, he plants peas, and in other fields he is preparing to plant the next crop of potatoes. Although there are times when the price of potatoes is lower at the market, it is very profitable when the price goes up. It is for this reason that Silvino is loyal to this tuber, as growing potatoes enables him to meet the needs of his family. Silvino is a very gracious customer every time he meets with the other members of his communal bank. This is his 7th loan with Kiva partner MFP, and he has always been good in making his payments. The money that Silvino is asking for this time will be used to purchase chemical fertilizers so that he can fertilize his next crop of potatoes.

Translated from Spanish by Christopher Knutson, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchasing fertilizer

loans.name: Marco

texts.es:
El señor Marcos V. ya ha tenido tres créditos con FVP los cuales pago puntual mente. 
En esté momento solicita un préstamo para terminar los acabados del exterior y los comprar los accesorios para el baño.  
Planea pagar el crédito con los ingresos de su trabajo en una fabrico en el departamento de jefe de control de calidad.
texts.en:
Mr. Marcos V. has already had three loans with FVP, all which he has repaid on time. At the moment he requests a loan in order to finish exterior finishings and buy accessories for the bathroom. He plans on repaying the loan with income from his job at a factory as manager in the quality control department.

Translated from Spanish by Erin Hopkins, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To finish the exterior finishes and buy accessories for the bathroom

loans.name: Víctor

texts.es: Víctor tiene 39 años, es casado y tiene 6 hijos que viven en su casa. En sus 17 años de casado, quien lidera la actividad agrícola de su familia es su esposa, porque a ella le agradan mucho estas labores, mientras que Víctor, conocido como el “chino”, sólo acude a la chacra en época de cosecha para cargar los sacos a los mercados de Tarma. Años atrás trabajaba como chofer, pero ahora compraron un carro y lo ingresó a una línea de transportes, entonces ahora “el chino” está conduciendo su propia movilidad y está muy contento por ello. A las 4.00am ya está haciendo cola esperando su turno, pero muchas veces, antes de su turno le piden sus servicios, y en esos días sus ganancias ya no son sólo 40 soles diarios, sino que aumenta a 80 por ello que siempre se levanta muy temprano. Los planes de Víctor son de trabajar muy duro para mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia, y tener otro negocio para que su esposa no se sacrifique tanto en la chacra. Víctor está ingresando al banco comunal de su esposa porque ella tuvo que viajar por el fallecimiento de un familiar. Entonces Víctor está asumiendo la responsabilidad de su esposa comprometiéndose a asistir a cada una de las reuniones de pago. El dinero que solicitan es para la compra de fertilizantes, y la otra parte para la compra de llantas nuevas para su auto.
texts.en:
Victor is 39 years old, is married and has six kids that live at home. In 17 years of marriage, his wife has led the agricultural activities, because she likes to do these tasks, while Victor, nicknamed the "Chinese", only goes to the farm during harvesting time to load bags to take to the markets in Tarma. Years ago he worked as a driver, but now he has bought a car and has joined a transportation line. Now the "Chinese" is driving himself and is very happy for this.

At 4:00 AM he is already queuing up in line waiting for his turn, but many times, before his turn people ask for his services. On these days his earnings increase from 40 soles per day to 80 soles, which is why he always gets up very early. Victor plans to work very hard to improve the quality of life for his family, and have another business so that his wife does not have to sacrifice so much at the farm. Victor is going to his wife's village bank because she had to travel for the death of a family member. Now Victor is assuming his wife's responsibility of attending each of the payment meetings. The money requested is to buy fertilizer and new tires for his car.

Translated from Spanish by Erin Hopkins, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy fertilizer

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es:
La señora Ana María C. ya ha tenido más de cuatro créditos con FVP los cuales pago puntual mente. Tiene  dedicándose a su negocio de renta de mesas y sillas para fiesta y también renta de  equipo de sonio, es el ingreso de su familia. 
 Desea nuevamente un préstamo para la compra de un equipo de sonido mas moderno ya que el anterior que tenia ya esta en malas condiciones, y no puede trabajar hasta que adquiera otro mejor y mas moderno.
texts.en:
Mrs. Ana Maria C. has now had more than four loans with FVP which she has paid punctually. She has dedicated herself to her business of renting tables and chairs for parties, as well as renting stereo equipment, it is the income for her family. She now wants a loan for the purchase of more modern stereo equipment now that the equipment she currently owns is in poor condition, and she can’t work until she acquires better and more modern equipment.

Translated from Spanish by William Gray, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: The purchase of stereo equipment

loans.name: Armando

texts.es: El señor Armando B. ha tenido ya un crédito con FVP el cual fue para poner el piso en su casa, desea nueva mente un préstamo para poder poner las protecciones en las ventas de la vivienda ya que el trabaja casi todo el día y su familia se queda solo y quiere la seguridad para ellos. Planea pagar el crédito con los ingresos de su trabajo como empleado de mantenimiento de un hotel. (Cuando se realizo la visita a la casa del señor Armando el no se encontraba la persona que nos atendió fue su esposa la señora Carmen Patricia Jaime quien ha parece en la foto.)
texts.en:
Mr. Armando B. has had a loan with FVP which was for the purpose of putting a floor in his house. He now wants a loan to be able to put bars on the windows of his living quarters now that he works nearly all day and his family stays there alone, and he wants security for them. He plans to pay the loan with income from his work as a maintenance man at a hotel. (When we made our visit to Mr. Armando’s house we did not we did not find him. The person who attended to us was his wife, Mrs. Carmen Patricia Jaime, who appears in the photograph.)

Translated from Spanish by William Gray, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Installation of bars on the windows of the house

loans.name: María Elena

texts.es: La señora María Elena H. con sus ahorros pudo construir un cuarto al cual le está haciendo falta el techo. Pero ella desea ponerle la losa de concreto porque es más segura y duradera. Por el momento no cuenta con el dinero necesario para llevar acabo el proyecto y terminar la recamara de sus hijas, es por eso que está solicitando un préstamo para comprar el material y pagar la mano de obra. Planea pagar el crédito con su ingreso que obtiene como empleado domestica, ya que su esposa el señor Miguel Ángel Salce de la Cruz, se encargara de los gastos familiares.
texts.en:
Señora María Elena H. was able to save enough to build a room onto her house, but it still needs a roof. She would like to put a concrete roof on it so it is safer and more durable. Right now she doesn't have the money she needs to finish the project and finish her daughters' bedroom. This is why she is requesting a loan to purchase the matierals and to pay for the labor. She plans to pay back the loan with the income she earns as a domestic employee since her husband, señor Miguel Ángel Salce de la Cruz, will take care of the family's expenses.

Translated from Spanish by Tanya Harper, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: A concrete slab

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Martha Alicia

texts.es:
La señora Martha Alicia D. y su esposo el señor Hermilo Filiberto tienen  dos hijos que están en la edad escolar pero tiene un problema en esté momento no cuentan con el dinero necesario para pagar la colegiatura.
Doña Martha Alicia y Don Hermilo trabajan como empleado de mantenimiento en un hotel estos son los ingresos de su familia.
Ellos nos están solicitando un préstamo para pagar la colegiatura de la escuela ya que se los están exigiendo para que sus hijos terminen el ciclo escolar.
texts.en:
Mrs. Martha Alicia D. and her husband Mr. Hermilo Filberto have two children who are school-aged but have a problem at the moment with the money necessary to pay the school fees. Mrs. Martha Alicia and Mr. Hermilo work as maintenance workers at a hotel which is the income for their family. They are asking us for a loan to pay the fees of the school now that the school is demanding the fees for their children to finish the school year.

Translated from Spanish by William Gray, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Schooling support

loans.name: Leonarda

texts.es: Leonarda tiene 51 años, vive con sus 3 hijos en su casa propia. Se dedica a la venta de comida en un mercado céntrico de su ciudad, atiende todas las mañanas para vender los platos típicos de su zona, ofreciendo a su clientela desayunos y almuerzos. Leonarda ya lleva más de 15 años en esta labor que le ha ayudado significativamente a seguir adelante, para lograr esos resultados se levanta a las 4 de la madrugada para vender sus comidas, y por la buena sazón y la atención cálida que ofrece ha sabido conquistar a sus clientes que siempre acuden a ella a consumir sus platos, y por ello su negocio es rentable. Para más adelante Leonarda desea seguir trabajando para mejorar su negocio, implementándolo con nuevos cubiertos para el servicio. Es la sexta vez que Leonarda está solicitando un préstamo con MFP, es una de las personas más activas de su banco comunal y su deseo es seguir trabajando por el bienestar en común. El dinero requerido lo invertirá en la compra de productos de primera necesidad, como sacos de arroz, azúcar y demás productos para abastecerse de lo necesario para la preparación de sus comidas.
texts.en:
Leonarda is 51 years old and lives with her 3 children in their own home. She sells food in the central market of her city. She serves the typical dishes of her region every morning, offering her customers breakfasts and lunches. Leonarda has been conducting her business for more than 15 years and it has helped her significantly to get ahead. In order to achieve these results she gets up at 4:00 in the morning to sell her foods, and through the good flavor and the attention to quality that she offers she has won over her customers and now they always come to her for the dishes; for this reason her business is profitable.

In the future Leonarda desires to keep working to better her business, beginning with new place settings for the service. It is the sixth time that Leonarda is soliciting a loan with MFP. She is one of the most active people in her communal bank and her desire is to continue working for the common well being of the members. The requested money will be invested in the purchase of primary products such as sacks of rice, sugar and additional products to stock the necessities for the preparation of her food.

Translated from Spanish by Breanne Kochert, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: For the purchase of groceries for the preparation of her food.

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Magna

texts.es: Magna vive sola, se dedica a la venta de granos y productos alimenticios que ella misma procesa con un simple molino o envía a moler para venderlos en las zonas más alejadas y rurales de su localidad. Los fines de semana viaja a la ciudad de Lima para vender estos mismos productos, este ritmo de trabajo lo tiene desde hace 13 años y durante este tiempo, su labor la llena de satisfacciones porque las ganancias suplen las necesidades que tiene para sostenerse. Su deseo es seguir trabajando para conseguir establecerse con una tienda de abarrotes y así descansar del esfuerzo físico de todos estos años. Es la cuarta vez que Magna está solicitando un préstamo con MFP, y está muy convencida de que es muy beneficioso el trabajo en equipo para desarrollarse, por lo que anima a sus demás compañeros de su banco comunal a unir los esfuerzos solidarios. El dinero que requiere lo invertirá en la compra de más granos, sacos de maíz, cebada, entre otros productos, para molerlos y prepararlos para la venta.
texts.en:
Magna lives alone. She makes a living selling grain and food products that she processes with a simple mill or sends to be ground; she then sells her products in the outermost, rural parts of her town. On weekends she travels to the city of Lima to sell her products. She has maintained this work schedule for 13 years now. Her work has given her much satisfaction over the years because her profits provide her with all that she needs to support herself. Magna’s wish is to keep working so that she can set up a grocery store and thus be able to rest after so many years of hard physical labor. This is the fourth time that Magna has requested a loan from Kiva partner MFP. She is convinced that teamwork is very helpful for development, and it is for this reason that she encourages the rest of her colleagues at the communal bank to work together. Magna will use the money she is requesting to invest in purchasing more grain--sacks of corn and barley, among other products--so that she can grind them and prepare them for sale.

Translated from Spanish by Christopher Knutson, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increasing her merchandise

loans.name: Rosalina

texts.es: Rosalina tiene  63 años, vive con sus hijos y sus nietos en su propia casa. Desde hace 14 años se dedica al bordado de fustanes, labor que aprendió de sus vecinas, y ahora le sirve para sostenerse y sostener en aquellos tiempos a sus hijos, que en retribución la apoyan en todo el trabajo que realiza. Su trabajo se intensifica más cuando es época de festividades porque hay mayor demanda de estos trajes que se lucen durante las fiestas. Rosalina disfruta cada día de trabajar en la comodidad de su casa y estar en la compañía de sus seres queridos, por lo que ha decidido seguir dedicándose a este trabajo hasta donde sus fuerzas le den. Es la segunda vez que tiene un préstamo con MFP, y está satisfecha por la labor que desempeña al ser un participe activa de su banco comunal, una vez más renueva su compromiso de puntualidad y responsabilidad. El dinero que está solicitando lo invertirá en la compra de los materiales que necesita para la elaboración de sus bordados, como aplicaciones de lentejuelas doradas, hilos plateados y de diversos colores por conos, telas, etc.
texts.en:
Rosalina is 63 years of age and lives in her own house with her children and grandchildren. For the last 14 years she has been making embroidered skirts, a skill which she learned from her neighbors. She now supports herself this way, and sometimes her children as well, and in return they help her with all of her labors. Her work is most intense during the holiday season because there is a great demand for this type of clothing which people like to wear and show off during the holidays. Rosalina enjoys every day of work in the comfort of her home and the company of those most dear to her, and so she has decided to continue working in this way for as long as her powers permit her. This will be her second loan with Microfinanzas PRISMA. She is satisfied with the duties she carries out in order to be an active participant in her communal bank, and once again she pledges herself to be punctual and responsible. The money that she is requesting will be used to buy the materials which she needs for the production of her embroidery, such as gold sequins, silver thread, spools of various colored thread, fabric, etc.

Translated from Spanish by Daniel Kvaka, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy materials for her embroidery

loans.name: Soledad

texts.es: Soledad tiene 20 años, vive con su madre y hermanos en la casa propia de sus padres. Se dedica a la fabricación de yeso, el cual sirve para la construcción y acabado de las casas; esta actividad la viene desarrollando desde su adolescencia, ya que sus padres le enseñaron a desempeñarse en esta labor y con el tiempo le han dado la entera responsabilidad. Soledad cuida de que cada parte del proceso sea cuidadosamente cumplido, porque de ello depende que el producto sea de calidad, también se encarga de proveer todos la materiales e insumos necesarios que se requieren para manufacturar el yeso en la fábrica artesanal que posee. Su trabajo requiere de bastante esfuerzo físico, por lo que Soledad trabaja incansablemente para lograr lo ingresos que serán de beneficio para su familia. Para el futuro quiere agrandar y mejorar la infraestructura de su fábrica, para así aumenta su producción. Es la primera vez que tiene un préstamo con MFP, está muy contenta de haber sido admitida  en el banco comunal, y tiene muchos deseos de seguir adelante. El dinero que está solicitando es para la compra de una camionada de leña y petróleo que son los combustibles indispensables que hacen funcionar el horno de cocimiento del yeso que produce su fábrica.
texts.en:
Soledad is 20 years old and lives with her mother and siblings in her parents house. She works at making plaster which is used for the construction and finishing of houses. She has been developing this trade since her adolescence when her parents taught her how to carry out this work, and over time they have given her the entire responsibility. Soledad takes care that every part of the process is carefully completed because that determines the quality of the product. She is also in charge of providing all of the materials and ingredients needed to make the plaster in their workshop. Her work requires a certain amount of physical strength, and so Soledad works tirelessly to earn the income that will benefit her family. For the future, she wants to enlarge and improve the infrastructure of her factory in order to increase production. This is the first time the she has sought a loan with Microfinanzas PRISMA. She is very please with having been accepted by the communal bank and she has a great desire to get ahead. The money that she is requesting is for the purchase of a truckload of firewood and fuel oil. These are indispensable for fueling the furnace in which they fire the plaster which her factory produces.

Translated from Spanish by Daniel Kvaka, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy fuel for the furnace.

loans.name: Banzragch

texts.en:
Banzragch T. is a 69-year-old businessman. Banzaragach was an accountant with a local government agency for many years and retired in 2003. As soon as he retired, he started a small retail business selling women's and men's shoes. He rented a small stall in Bombogor Center, a local retail market. His daughter travels to Ereen, a Chinese border town, and imports the shoes. He lives with his wife in the Chingeltay district of Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia.

Banzragch says that his retirement compensation is not enough to support his family and that is why he started his business. He believes that access to education is the most precious gift that parents can give to their children and he helps share his youngest son's education expenses abroad. If the business does well, he would like to expand by renting one more nearby stall. He requests a loan to purchase more shoes from Ereen, China.

loans.use: To purchase more shoes from Ereen, China

loans.name: Enhjargal

texts.en:
Enhjargal P. lives with his wife and a teenage daughter in the Chingeltay district of Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. His daughter is a student in a local secondary school. Enhjargal has a small business making shoes. He makes winter shoes for adults and children, and all his shoes are sewed manually.

He launched his shoe business in 2000, and since then the business has expanded as the demand for his shoes has steadily increased. Following the increased demand, Enhjargal rented a larger work space and hired his two sisters. They make on average 100 shoes in a month.

In the future, he would like to own an automatic machine to make the shoe-making process faster and more labor efficient. He requests a loan to purchase raw materials, such as leather and insulation materials.

loans.use: To purchase raw materials, such as leather and insulation materials.

loans.name: Ulziijargal

texts.en:
Ulziijargal B. is 32 and lives with her husband and son in the Chingeltay district of Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. Ulziijargal drives a passenger microbus between "7 Buudal" and “Sharga Morit,” one of most popular routes in the city. She has been driving a passenger bus along that route for the last six years. The route is very popular and she knows it very well.

Her husband Tumen demberel is also a driver. He drives a cab in the city. With their profit, Ulziijargal and her husband were able to upgrade their old cars. With this loan, she will buy spare parts to repair their car. Their next goal is to upgrade their house. In the picture, Ulziijargal is with her husband Tumendemberel.

loans.use: To buy spare parts

loans.name: Yenina Lidia

texts.es:
La señora Yenina Lidia A. Y. tiene 22 años vive en Asentamiento Humano Aurora Díaz, distrito de Salaverry, provincia de Trujillo, departamento de La Libertad, Perú.
Ella estudió secundaria completa, no siguió más estudios debido a que se casó y se dedicó a su hogar. Tiene 01 pequeña hija que depende enteramente de ella.
Yenine se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza, al inicio se dedicó a la venta de pasteles, luego inicio la venta de productos de belleza hace 4 años, negocio que le es muy rentable y le da muchas ganancias que le han permitido comprar una refrigeradora la que ahora utiliza para vender gaseosas. Su negocio lo desarrolla en su domicilio.
Con el primer crédito de 300 soles que recibió de su banco comunal “Las Auroras en Acción II”, lo invirtió en la compra de productos de belleza.
Con el crédito de 800 soles, que será cancelado en  6 meses, lo invertirá en la compra de màs productos de belleza y gaseosas.
Yenine sueña con tener una bodega y estudiar ingles.
texts.en:
Ms. Yenina Lidia A. Y. is 22 years old and lives in the Aurora Díaz housing settlement, district of Salaverry,Trujillo province, department of La Libertad, Perú.She completed her secondary studies but did not continue to study because she married and dedicated herself to her home. She has one small daughter that depends entirely on her. Yenina is dedicated to selling beauty products. At the beginning she dedicated herself to selling cakes but then began to sell beauty products four years ago, a business that is very profitable and gives her a lot of income that has allowed her to purchase a refrigerator that she now uses to sell soft drinks. Her business is run from her home. With the first loan of 300 soles that she received from the communal bank "Las Auroras en Acción II" she invested in the purchase of beauty products. With the credit of 800 soles, which will be paid off in 6 months, she will invest in the purchase of more beauty products and soft drinks. Yenina's dream is to have a store and study English.

Translated from Spanish by Helen Smith, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of beauty products and soft drinks

loans.name: Cecilia Del Rosario

texts.es:
La señora Cecilia del Rosario C. B. tiene 34 años, vive en el Asentamiento Humano Aurora Díaz, distrito de Salaverry, provincia de Trujillo, departamento de La Libertad, Perú.
Ella estudió corte y confección, carrera que no ejerció debido a que no le gustaba. Tiene 01 pequeño hijo que depende enteramente de ella.
Cecilia se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza, negocio que inicio hace 18 años al mismo tiempo que vendía joyas, dejò su negocio debido a que consiguió trabajo y que ha vuelto a retomar hace poco tiempo. Su negocio lo desarrolla en su propio domicilio. 
Ella es socia nueva del Banco Comunal “Las Auroras en Acción II”.  Con este crédito de 300 soles que será cancelado en 4 meses, lo invertirá en la  compra de productos de belleza para su stock.
Cecilia sueña con tener una tienda de piñateria.
texts.en:
Ms. Cecilia del Rosario C. B. is 34 years old and lives in the Aurora Díaz settlement, Salaverry district, Trujillo province, department of La Libertad Perú. She studied dressmaking, a career that she did not practice because she did not like it. She has one young son who depends entirely on her. Cecilia is dedicated to the sale of beauty products, a business that she began 18 years ago at the same time that she sold jewelry. She left her business when she found a job and she has returned to it recently. Her business is run out of her home. She is a new member of the communal bank “Las Auroras en Acción II”. With this loan of 300 soles which will be repaid in 4 months, she will invest in the purchase of beauty products for her stock. Cecilia dreams of having a piñata store.

Translated from Spanish by Helen Smith, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase beauty products for her stock

loans.name: Isabel Cristina

texts.es:
La señora Isabel Cristina S. G. tiene 36 años vive en Asentamiento Humnao Aurora Díaz, distrito de Salaverry, provincia de Trujillo, departamento de La Libertad, Perú.
Ella estudió hasta 3ro. de secundaria, abandonò los estudios debido a que se dedicò a trabajar para apoyar a sus hermanos menores. Tiene 03 hijos que dependen económicamente de ella.
Isabel se dedica a la venta de jugos, sándwich y gaseosas, al principio vendía marcianos, pero dejo el negocio para dedicarse a la venta de jugos en un triciclo, luego fue ampliando a la venta de sándwich y gaseosas, con las ganancias que obtuvo compro un kiosco de madera y una vitrina . Su negocio los desarrolla en el deposito de petróleo de Salaverry.
Con el primer crédito de 300 soles que recibió de su Banco Comunal “Las Auroras en Acción II”, lo invirtió en la compra de gaseosas.
Con el crédito de 400 soles, que será cancelado en  4 meses, lo invertirá en la  compra de galletas y gaseosas .
Isabel sueña con terminar de construir su casa.
texts.en:
Ms.Isabel Cristina S. G. is 36 years old and lives in the Aurora Díaz settlement, Salaverry district, Trujillo province, department of La Libertad, Perú. She studied until the third year of high school but abandoned her studies because she was dedicated to work to support her younger siblings. She has three children who are economically dependent on her. Isabel is dedicated to selling juices, sandwiches and soft drinks. At first she sold marcianos (fruit ice cream treats) but left the business to sell juices from a tricycle, then she increased the sale of sandwiches and soft drinks. With her earnings she purchased a wooden kiosk and a display case. Her business is located in the oil deposit of Salaverry. With the first loan of 300 soles that she received from the communal bank “Las Auroras en Acción II”, she invested in the purchase of soft drinks. With a credit of 400 soles, which will be repaid in 4 months, she will invest in the purchase of cookies and soft drinks. Isabel dreams of finishing the construction of her house.

Translated from Spanish by Helen Smith, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase of cookies and soft drinks

loans.name: Nemat

texts.ru: Немат Атакулов мужчина 45 лет. Женат и имеет 3-х детей. Немат занимается откормом и продажей скота, а его жена занимается переработкой и продажей молока. Немат кредитуется уже 2 года. Когда он пришел в первый раз брать кредит, у него было очень малое количество скота. Сейчас у Немата большое количество мелко рогатого скота. Сейчас у его жены только одна дойная корова. Немат планирует купить для своей жены еще одну дойную корову с теленком, и он благодарен нашим кредиторам за помощь в осуществлении его планов.
texts.en:
Nemat A. is a 45 year old man. He is married and has 3 children. Nemat fattens and sell livestock; his wife processes and sells milk. Nemat has been a borrower for 2 years. When he came to get a loan for the first time he had a very small quantity of livestock. Today, Nemat has a large quantity of small livestock. Currently, his wife only has one dairy cow. Nemat plans to purchase another dairy cow with a calf for his wife and he will be grateful to our lenders for their help in fulfilling his plans.

Translated from Russian by Sabina Holzman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase a dairy cow

loans.name: Oyun

texts.en:
Oyun O. is a widow and lives with her youngest son in the Narantuul district of Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. Oyun has a small business making shoes. She makes warm winter shoes for women and men. While she sews shoes at home, her son sells completed shoes in a rented stall in the Narantuul market, the largest open market in Ulaanbaatar.

Oyun has been running her shoemaking business for the last thirteen years and with the profits she has bought a car for her son so he can earn extra income. In his free time, Oyun's son uses his car as a city taxi. Oyun's goal is to ensure that her son will have enough working capital to keep the shoemaking business going after she is too old to work. She requests a loan to purchase raw materials, such as leather and glue for her business.

loans.use: To purchase raw materials for making shoes

loans.name: Santos Idulbina

texts.es:
La señora Santos Idulbina S. S. tiene 58 años, vive en Asentamiento Humano Aurora Díaz, distrito de Salaverry, provincia de Trujillo, departamento de La Libertad, Perú.
Ella estudió hasta 2do. de primaria, abandonò los estudios debido a que sus padres no tenían los medios económicos para seguir apoyándola  y se dedicò a trabajar. Tiene 05 hijos de los cuales 01 depende económicamente de ella.
Santos se dedica a la venta de menú (comida), gaseosa y cerveza.  Iniciò su negocio hace 26 años con una bodega, la que abandonò debido a que se enfermò, con el tiempo se dedicò a la venta de gas (combustible) y nuevamente retomò la venta de menú, gaseosa y cerveza. Con las ganancias obtenidas compro 02 vitrinas que luego vendió. Su negocio es muy rentable y lo desarrolla en su propio domicilio.
Con el primer crédito de 300 soles que recibió de su Banco Comunal “Las Auroras en Acción II”, lo invirtió en la compra de alimentos de primera necesidad y utensilios para la venta de menú.
Con el crédito de 1000 soles, que será cancelado en  6 meses, lo invertirá en la  compra de cerveza y gaseosa para aumentar su capital de trabajo.
Santos sueña con tener un bar-restaurante en su domicilio.
Ella pertenece al club de madres de su sector.
texts.en:
Señora Santos Idulbina S. S. is 59 years old and lives in Asentamiento Humano Aurora Díaz, in the district of Salaverry, in the province of Trujillo, in the region of La Libertad, Peru. She studied up until her second year of primary school, after which she had to begin working because her parents could no longer pay for her education. She has 5 children but only 1 of them is still dependent on her. She is also a member of the local mothers' club. Santos sells meals, soft drinks and beer. She began this business 26 years ago, operating out of a small shop, but had to leave it when she became ill. When she returned to work once more, she first tried selling fuel but she eventually returned to selling meals, soft drinks and beer. Her business went very well and with her profits she bought, and then later resold, two different stalls. The business continues to turn a healthy profit and today she works out of her own home. Santos' first loan from the Las Auroras en Acción II Communal Bank was of 300 soles and with it she bought the ingredients and utensils she needed to make and sell her meals. With this loan of 1,000 soles, which she will pay back in 6 months, she will buy beer and soft drinks in order to increase her working capital. Santos dreams of having a bar and restaurant in her home.

Translated from Spanish by Sara Sultan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy beer and soft drinks

loans.name: Olim

texts.ru: Олим – мужчина средних лет (37 лет), женат и отец 3-детей. У Олима есть стадо мелко-рогатого скота, состояшее примерно из 30 овец и 10 козлов. Его жена домохозяйка, но в свободное время занимается переработкой шерсти, вяжет разные теплые вещи. Эти вещи она продаёт соседям или родственникам. Олим каждое утро гонит своё стадо в горы, пасет их, и вечером отгоняет их обратно. У Олима пока нет крупно-рогатого скота. Но Олим за этот новый займ хочет купить двух средних быков. Откормив их 3-4 месяца, он может продать за очень хорошую цену. Олим очкнь рад сотрудничеству с нами, потому, что кредит ему очень помогает.
texts.en:
Olim is a married middle-age man (37 years old). He is a father of three. Olim owns 30 sheep and 10 goats. His wife is a homemaker. In her free time, she processes wool and knits warm clothes, which she then sells to her neighbots and relatives. Olim would like to get a loan so that he could purchase two bulls. He would like to raise these bulls and resell them at a higher price. Olim is very happy to be able to cooperate with us because credit helps him a lot.

Translated from Russian by Oksana Buranbaeva, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: cattle

loans.name: Vilma Frecia

texts.es:
La señora Vilma Frecia Y. E. tiene 59 años, vive en el distrito de Salaverry, provincia de Trujillo, departamento de La Libertad, Perú.
Ella estudió Auxiliar de Enfermería, carrera que ejerció durante 5 años y que abandono para dedicarse al cuidado de su hogar. Tiene 04 hijos y ninguno depende de ella económicamente.
Vilma tiene una bodega, inicio su negocio vendiendo algunos abarrotes en casa de su madre el mismo que abandono cuando viajo a argentina y que al regresar puso nuevamente en su domicilio, amplio su negocio con la venta de gaseosas y otros productos que le dejan ganancias. Su negocio lo desarrolla en su propio domicilio. 
Con el primer crédito de 300 soles que recibió de su Banco Comunal “Jerid Camino al Éxito II”, lo invirtió en la compra de arroz y gaseosas.  
Con el crédito de 1200 soles, que será cancelado en  6 meses, lo invertirá en la  compra de insumos para la preparación de alimentos y gaseosas para ampliar el capital de trabajo.
Vilma sueña con terminar de construir su casa y le gustaría viajar a Argentina.
texts.en:
Señora Vilma Frecia Y. E. is 59 years old and lives in the Salaverry district of the province of Trujillo, in the region of La Libertad, Peru. She went to school to be a medical assistant and worked in this field for 5 years until she left it so that she could dedicate herself to being a homemaker. She has 4 children, but they are all independent now. Vilma owns a shop. She first dabbled in the business when she started selling groceries out of her mother's house, but left this behind when she traveled to Argentina. Upon her return however, she set up a small store in her own house, and expanded into the sale of meals, soft drinks and a variety of other products that sell well. Her business continues to develop in her own home. The first loan she received from the Jerid Camino al Éxito II Communal Bank was of 300 soles, which she used to buy rice and soft drinks. This loan of 1,200 soles, which will be repaid in 6 months, will be used to buy soft drinks and the ingredients for her meals in order to increase her working capital. Vilma dreams of finishing construction on her house and would one day like to visit Argentina again.

Translated from Spanish by Sara Sultan, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy soft drinks and various ingredients for meal preparation.

loans.name: Merci

texts.es:
La señora Merci E. R. tiene 31 años y pertenece al Banco Comunal Buen Pastor, vive en el caserío Lluin del distrito de Mache provincia de Otuzco del departamento de La Libertad.
Estudió secundaria completa pero no continuó estudiando debido a que se casó.
Merci se dedica a la compra venta de cereales, los cereales los consigue en las chacras al momento de las cosechas.
Su primer crédito fue de 300 soles que lo canceló en 4 cuotas, comprò cereales.
Con este crédito de 1,000 que será pagado en 6 cuotas comprará cereales y otros productos de la estación.
Merci sueña con ver a sus hijos profesionales para que tengan una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Mrs. Merci E. R. is 31 years old and belongs to the Buen Pastor (Good Pastor) Communal Bank. She lives in the village of Lluin, district of Mache, province of Otuzco, in the region of La Libertad. She completed middle school but did not continue studying owing to the fact that she married. Merci is dedicated to the purchase and sale of cereal grains which she gets from the farms at the time of harvest.

Her first loan was for 300 PEN which she paid in four payments, and was used to purchase cereal grains. With this loan of 1000 PEN which will be paid in six payments she will purchase cereal grains and other seasonal products. Merci dreams of seeing her children become professionals so that they have a better quality of life.

Translated from Spanish by William Gray, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: The purchase of cereal grains and other seasonal products

loans.name: Abduvahob

texts.ru: Абдувахобу 42 лет. У него есть жена и 5-ро детей. Три сына и две дочки. Старшие сыновья уехали в Россию для работы. Работая там, они высылают деньги родителям. Родители копят высланные деньги, чтобы потом потратить их на женитьбу сыновей.  Дочки помогают по хозяйству. Жена занимается переработкой пряжи. Она сама ездит на рынок, чтобы продать их. Абдувахоб пасет скот в горах и возвращается очень поздно. Недавно он узнал у соседей, что можно взять кредит в нашей организации, для увеличения количества скота. Теперь он наш клиент.
texts.en:
Abduvahob is 42 years old. He is married with five children, three sons and two daughters. His adult sons have left for Russia, where they work and send money home to their parents. The parents are saving this money for their sons' weddings. The daughters help around the house. The mother processes wool and sells it at the market. Abduvahob herds cattle in the mountains and returns home very late. Recently his neighbors told him that he could get a loan from our organization and increase cattle herd. Now Abduvahob is our client.

Translated from Russian by Oksana Buranbaeva, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: cattle

loans.name: Eva Emperatriz

texts.es:
La señora Eva Emperatriz J. D. R. tiene 58 años vive en Asentamiento Humano Aurora Díaz, distrito D. Salaverry, provincia D. Trujillo, departamento D. La Libertad, Perú.
Ella estudió hasta II ciclo D. Educación, abandonó los estudios debido a que se casò y se dedicó a su hogar. Tiene 06 hijos D. los cuales 01 depenD. económicamente D. ella.
Eva se dedica a la venta D. tejidos, inició su negocio hace ya 10 años vendiendo tapetes y chompas, al principio tenia pocas ventas pero luego se hizo D. clientes y amplio su negocio vendiendo vestidos, carteras y todo tipo D. tejido que le da muchas ganancias. Por un tiempo también se dedicó a la fabricación D. sandalias y zapatillas que luego abandono. Su negocio lo desarrolla en su propio domicilio.
Con el primer crédito D. 300 soles que recibió D. su banco comunal “Las Auroras en Acción II”, lo invirtió en la compra D. hilos.
Con el crédito D. 500 soles, que será cancelado en  4 meses, lo invertirá en la compra D. hilos y materiales para tejer.
Eva tiene el gran sueño D. tener una tienda D. manualidades en su casa.
texts.en:
Mrs. Eva Emperatriz J. D. R. is 58 years old and lives in the Aurora Diaz settlement, district of Salaverry, province of Trujillo, in the La Libertad area of Peru. She studied until fourth graD. when she left her studies owing to the fact that she married and dedicated herself to her home. She has six children, of which one depends on her financially.

Eva is dedicated to the sale of knitted goods. She started her business ten years ago selling tablecloths and sweaters. At first she had few sales but later she got more customers and increased her business selling dresses, purses, and every type of knitted good that gave her good earnings. For a while she also was involved in the making of sandals and shoes, which she later gave up. She carries out her business from her home.

Her first loan of 300 PEN that she received from her communal bank, “Las Auroras en Accion II” (The Dawns in Action II), she invested in the purchase of thread. This loan of 500 PEN, which she will pay off in four months, will be invested in the purchase of threads and materials for knitting. Eva has the big dream of having a store of handicrafts in her home.

Translated from Spanish by William Gray, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: The purchase of threads and materials for knitting

loans.name: Malohat

texts.ru: Малохат Бойматова – женщина 47 лет. Замужем и мать 4-х детей. Она занимается продажей детской одежды на рынке «Фаровон» города Гафурова. Малохат закупает товар на оптовом рынке города Истаравшан. Она ездит за товаром 2 раза в месяц. Её муж мастер строительных работ. Он тоже зарабатывает неплохо, но по мере требования взрослых детей, ему не удаётся накапливать деньги. Малохат уже 3 года кредитуется у нас. Когда она начинала, у нее было маленькое количество товара. Но сейчас Малохат расширилась, и за свой последний кредит, она закупила партию детской обуви. Теперь у Малохат увеличился ассортимент.
texts.en:
Malohat B. is a 47-year old. She is a married mother of four. She sells children's clothing at the Farovon market of Gafurov. Twice a month she travels to Istaravshan to purchase goods at the wholesale market. Malohat's husband is a construction worker. His income isn't bad wither but since their children are growing up, they do not manage to save money. Malohat has been out client for three years. When she started off, she had few goods but since then she managed to expand her business. She used her last loan to purchase children's shoes. Now Malohat offers a better assortment of goods.

Translated from Russian by Oksana Buranbaeva, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: sales of children's clothing and shoes

loans.name: Dalma

texts.es: La señora Dalma G., pertenece al Banco Comunal “La Libertad”, vive en el Jr. Sargento Lores cdra. 03 – Caserío La Libertad, Distrito D. Bellavista, Departamento D. San Martín. Es Casada, tiene 32 años y es madre D. 02 hijos, que aun dependen D. ella. Con su primer crédito D. S/. 300.00 por iniciativa propia emprendió su  negocio D. Venta D. Abarrotes, que desD. sus inicios  dio buenos resultados, por la calidad D. sus productos, sus precios cómodos y al gusto del cliente En la actualidad continua con el mismo negocio ubicada en su propia casa, donD. sus principales clientes son moradores D. la comunidad, vecinos y amigos. Con este préstamo D. S/. 2,000.00 que cancelará a un plazo D. 06 meses, comprará  más productos para surtir su negocio como arroz y azúcar en sacos, huevos en javas,  insumos para el aseo personal y limpieza del hogar, gaseosas en paquetes, golosinas  y otros productos para mantener contenta a su clientela, Hoy se siente muy feliz del trabajo y servicio que brinda y agradece a Manuela Ramos, por apoyar a personas como ella que quieren trabajar y salir adelante, espera que sigan así por mucho tiempo y ayuden a muchas familias y mujeres emprendedoras.
texts.en:
Mrs. Dalma G. is a member of the “La Libertad” community bank. She lives in Sargento Lores block 3 – Caserío La Libertad, in the Bellavista district, San Martín department. She is 32, married, and has 2 dependent children. On her own initiative and with her first loan of 300 PEN, she started her business of selling groceries. Because of the quality of her products, the reasonable prices, and her customers' requests, the business has done well from the beginning. She still runs the business, which is located in her house. Her primary customers are residents of the community, neighbors, and friends. With this loan of 2,000 PEN, which she will repay in 6 months, she will buy more products to stock her store like rice, sacks of sugar, eggs, items for personal hygiene, house cleaning products, packages of soft drinks, sweets, and other products to keep her customers happy. She feels very happy about the work and service that she gives. She is grateful to Manuela Ramos for supporting people like her who want to work and get ahead. She hopes that they continue to help many families and women entrepreneurs for a long time.

Translated from Spanish by Ginny Kalish, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Buy groceries: rice, sugar and other wholesale products

loans.name: Dora Sabina

texts.es:
La señora Dora Sabina B. D. V. tiene 50 años, vive en Asentamiento Humano Aurora Díaz, distrito D. Salaverry, provincia D. Trujillo, departamento D. La Libertad, Perú.
Ella estudió la carrera D. auxiliar D. enfermería pero no ejerció debido a que salió embarazada y se dedico a su hogar. Tiene 03 hijos D. cuales solo 01 depenD. económicamente D. ella.
Dora se dedica a la venta D. productos D. belleza y cerveza, inicio vendiendo ropa hace 3 años luego inicio la venta D. cerveza y hace 1 año también se dedica a la venta D. productos D. belleza, con las ganancias que obtuvo a comprado una vitrina para exhibir sus productos D. belleza. Su negocio lo desarrolla en su propio domicilio. 
Con el primer crédito D. 300 soles que recibió D. su banco comunal “Las Auroras en Acción II”, lo invirtió en la compra D. ropa interior para la venta. 
Con el crédito D. 1500 soles, que será cancelado en  6 meses, lo invertirá en la  compra D. cervezas y gaseosas, así como D. productos D. belleza.
Dora sueña con tener una bodega en su casa.
texts.en:
Mrs. Dora Sabina Beltran D. V. is 50 years old and lives in the settlement of Aurora Diaz, district of Salaverry, province of Trujillo, in the region of La Libertad, Peru. She studied to be a nurse’s aiD., but did not complete it owing to the fact that she became pregnant and dedicated herself to her home. She has three children of which one is financially dependent on her. Dora is in the sale of beauty products and beers. She started selling clothes three years ago and later started selling beer, and for one year she has also been selling beauty products. With the earnings she obtained she bought a display cabinet for displaying her beauty products. She runs her business in her home.

Her first loan of 300 PEN, which she received from her communal bank “Las Auroras in Action II” (The Dawns in Action II), she invested in the purchase of underclothes to sell. This loan of 1500 PEN, which she will pay in six months, she will invest in the purchase of beer and sodas, as well as beauty products. Dora dreams of having a grocery store in her house.

Translated from Spanish by William Gray, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: The purchase of beer and sodas, as well as beauty products

loans.name: Eufemia

texts.es:
La señora Eufemia C. D. R. tiene 66 años vive en Chongoyape, distrito D. Paijan, provincia D. Ascope, departamento D. La Libertad, Perú.
Ella estudió hasta 1er grado D. primaria, abandono los estudios debido a que sus padres no tenían los medios económicos para seguir apoyándola, tiene 10 hijos y ninguno depenD. económicamente D. ella.
Eufemia se dedica a la venta D. condimentos, inicio su negocio con la venta D. leche  y verduras hace 20 años en Paijan y luego se traslado al mercado D.  CasagranD. donD. se dedico a la venta D. leche y verduras, con las ganancias obtenidas amplio su negocio a la venta D. condimentos hace 2 años, negocio que le es rentable y que desarrolla actualmente en el mercado modelo D. CasagranD.. 
Con el primer crédito D. 300 soles que recibió D. su banco comunal “Manos Unidas”, lo invirtió en la compra D. verduras. 
Con el crédito D. 2000 soles, que será cancelado en  6 meses, lo invertirá en la  compra D. todo tipo D. condimentos para la venta.
Eufemia sueña con comprarse un molino eléctrico y le gustaría conocer argentina.
Ella pertenece al club D. madres D. su sector.
texts.en:
Señora Eufemia C. D. R. is 66 and lives in Chongoyape in the district of Paijan, in the province of Ascope, in the department of La Libertad, Perú. She studied through first graD. and stopped going to school because her parents didn't have the economic means to support her education anymore. She has 10 children, none of whom depend on her financially. Eufemia sells condiments. She started her business 20 years ago by selling milk and vegetables in Paijan. She then moved to a market in CasagranD. to sell condiments 2 years ago. Her business is profitable and she currently has it in the model market in CasagranD.. With her first loan of 300 PEN that she received from her communal bank, "Manos Unidas" (United Hands), she invested in the purchase of vegetables. With this credit of 2000 PEN, which will be repaid in 6 months, she will invest in the purchase of all kinds of condiments to sell. Eufemia dreams about buying an electric mill and would like to go to Argentina. She belongs to the mother's club in her area.

Translated from Spanish by Tanya Harper, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: She will purchase all kinds of condiments for food

loans.name: Oyuntsetseg

texts.en:
Oyuntsetseg has a small retail business selling motorcycle parts and accessories. Her husband is unemployed and stays home most of the time due to an ongoing illness. Oyuntsetseg D. lives with her husband and two teenage children in the Narantuul district of Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. Her two children are high school students.

When Mongolia transitioned from a command economy to a free market economy with the fall of the Soviet Union in the early 1990s, she started her own business selling secondhand motorcycle parts and accessories at the local market. In 1997, she bought two large containers at the local market in order to expand her business.

Although Oyuntsetseg makes a reasonable sum of money from her business, most of the profit is spent on expensive medicines for her sick husband. She hopes to expand her business in order to meet the ever increasing financial needs of her family. She requests a loan to purchase more wholesale motorcycle accessories to increase her business inventory.

loans.use: To purchase more wholesale motorcycle accessories

loans.name: Asunción Del Pilar

texts.es:
La señora Asunción del Pilar A. D. A. tiene 48 años, vive en el distrito D. Salaverry, provincia D. Trujillo, departamento D. La Libertad, Perú.
Ella estudió hasta 2do D. secundaria, abandono los estudios debido a que sus padres no tenían los medios económicos para seguir apoyándola. Tiene 03 hijos D. los cuales  01 aun depenD. económicamente D. ella.
Asunción se dedica a la costura y tiene una pequeña bodega, iniciò su negocio  con la venta D. kerosene (combustible)y verduras que abandonò para dedicarse al cuidado D. su pequeña hija, luego se dedicò a la costura. Con el tiempo a iniciado la venta D. abarrotes y D. productos D. belleza. También se dedico a la venta D. calzado y queso por temporadas, su negocio lo desarrolla en su domicilio. 
Con el primer crédito D. 300 soles que recibió D. su banco comunal “Jerid Camino al Éxito II”, lo invirtió en la compra D. calzado   
Con el crédito D. 1200 soles, que será cancelado en  6 meses, lo invertirá en la  compra D. insumos para la elaboración D. alimentos para aumentar el capital D. trabajo.
Asunción sueña con tener una bodega granD. y comprarse un carro
Ella pertenece al club D. madres D. su sector
texts.en:
Mrs. Asunción del Pilar A. D. A. is 48 years old, lives in the district of Salaverry, province of Trujillo, department of La Libertad, Perú. She completed her second year of high school, but had to leave school because her parents did not have the economic means to continue supporting her. She has three children, one of whom is still financially dependent on her.

Asunción is a seamstress and has a small store. She began her business with the sale of kerosene (combustible) and vegetables, which she left to care for her small daughter; later she began her work as a seamstress. With time she has begun to sell groceries and beauty products. She also sells footwear and seasonal cheeses. She conducts her business from her home.

With the loan of 1200 soles, which will be repaid in 6 months, she will buy consumable products for food production in order to increase her working capital. Asunción dreams of having a big store and of buying herself a car. She belongs to the club of mothers in her area.

Translated from Spanish by Breanne Kochert, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: for the purchase of consumable products for the preparation of foods

loans.name: Mehri

texts.ru: Мехри – женщина средних лет (43 лет). Замужем и имеет трех детей. Она занимается продажей овощей на рынке «Панчшанбе» города Худжанда. Она продаёт в основном огурцы и помидоры. Сейчас огурцы и помидоры растут только в парниках. Она закупает их у дехканин, которые выращивают овощи в больших парниках. Сейчас огурцы и помидоры стоят дорого на рынке, но люди все равно покупают их. Потому, что потребность организма в витаминах весной очень большая. Через 1,5-2 месяца у всех поспеют помидоры и огурцы  в огороде, и потом цена на них упадет. Поэтому Мехри хочет увеличить свой ассортимент, и продовать еще и другие фрукты и овощи.
texts.en:
Mehri is a middle aged woman (43 years old). She is married and has three children. She sells vegetables at the “Panchshanbe” market in Khuhand. She mostly sells cucumbers and tomatoes. Right now cucumbers and tomatoes only grow in green houses. Mehri purchases them from farmers who grow vegetables in large green houses. Right now cucumbers and tomatoes are expensive at the market, but people still buy them, because the body has a very large demand for vitamins in the spring. In 1.5-2 months everyone will have cucumbers and tomatoes ripen in their garden and their price will drop. This is why Mehri would like to increase her product selection and also sell other fruits and vegetables.

Translated from Russian by Sabina Holzman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Increase product selection

loans.name: Khurshed

texts.ru: Хушед молодой человек 30 лет. Он женат и имеет дочку и сына. Его жена нигде не работает. Она сидит дома и делает домашнюю работу, нянчит детей и по мере возможности кормит скот. Хуршед занимается откормом и продажей скота. Начало весны для Хуршеда – это сезон закупа скота, потому, что скот сейчас стоит дешево. И для откорма скота не надо много тратиться. Скот ест горную траву, и Хуршед не покупает для скота сено. Через 4 месяца наступает священный месяц Рамазан, и городские люди начинают покупать скот. Вот тогда, Хуршед продаст свой скот.
texts.en:
Khurshed is a young 30 year old man. He is married and has a daughter and a son. His wife does not have a job. She stays at home, keeps the house, raises the children and when she can, feeds the livestock. Khurshed fattens and sells livestock. The start of spring is the season to purchase livestock for Khurshed, because livestock is currently cheap and he does not need to spend a lot on their feed. The livestock eats mountain grasses and Khurshed does not buy hay for the livestock. In 4 months starts the holy month of Ramadan and city residents start to purchase livestock. Then Khurshed will sell his livestock.

Translated from Russian by Sabina Holzman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Raise livestock

loans.name: Munhzaya

texts.en:
Munhzaya T. lives with her husband and three children in the Narantuul district of Ulaanbaatar, the capital city of Mongolia. Her two older children are high school students, and the youngest daughter goes to a local kindergarten.

Munhzaya runs a small fast food cafeteria in the city. She started the cafeteria in early 2008. Her cafeteria is located in the busiest area of the local district, and is usually full with customers who work and live in the neighborhood. She has hired a cook and a waitress and the cafeteria serves 12 different types of local food. She is focusing on food quality and customer satisfaction in order to attract more local customers. One of her biggest dreams is to make the cafeteria business hugely successful and then to expand her cafeteria to a bigger restaurant.

Munhzaya requests a loan to purchase food ingredients like flour, vegetables, and meat.

loans.use: Purchase food ingredients for her cafeteria

loans.name: Numon

texts.ru: Нумон мужчина 43 лет , женат имеет пятерых детей. Работает таксистом на своём автомобиле. Его жена работает медсестрой в поликлинике. У Нумона два сына уже женаты , имеют отдельное хозяйство. Дочери учатся в ВУЗах. Нумон с утра до вечера работает на линии города Худжанда. Узнав, что в кредит можно отремонтировать свой автомобиль, он решил взять кредит в Микроинвесте
texts.en:
Numon is a 43 year old man. He is married and has five children. Numon works as a taxi drive using his own car. His wife works as a nurse at a clinic. Numon has two sons who are already married and have their own households. His daughters study in college. Numon works from morning to evening on Khujand’s route. After finding out that he could get a loan to repair his car he decided to take out a loan from MicroInvest.

Translated from Russian by Sabina Holzman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Auto repairs

loans.name: Turdijon

texts.ru: Турдиджон – женщина 44 лет. Замужем и мать 4-х детей. Старший сын женился в прошлом году. Сейчас невестка Турдиджон беременна. Должна родит в мае месяце. Сын очень старается работать и зарабатывать деньги, чтоб подготовится к родам жены. Турдиджон тоже очень волнуется, потому, что это ее первый внук. Турдиджон – домохозяйка. Её муж пастух. У них есть небольшое стадо овец, но Турдиджон хочет купить дойную корову, чтобы было молоко для ее внука.
texts.en:
Turdijon is a 44 year old woman. She is married and is the mother of 4 children. Her oldest son got married last year. Right now Turdijon’s daughter-in-law is pregnant, she is due in May. Turdijon’s son tries hard to work and earn money in order to be ready for the birth. Turdijon is also very nervous because this is her first grandson. Turdijon is a homemaker. Her husband is a shepherd. They have a large flock of sheep, but Turdijon would like to buy a dairy cow so that they have milk for her grandson.

Translated from Russian by Sabina Holzman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase a dairy cow

loans.name: Barno

texts.ru: Зайниддинова  Барно женщина , 64 лет , замужем имеет троих детей. Она занимается бизнесом ,продажи нижнего женского белья и ночнушек. По завозу товаров её помогает её муж, и сын. Товар привозят с города Истаравшана, с оптового рынка. Барно хочет получив кредит увеличить товар весене- летнего ассортимента. Её бизнес увеличился за время кредитования, она кредитуется с 2007 года. Барно одна из положительных клиентов Микроинвест.
texts.en:
Barno Z. is a 64 year old woman, she is married and has three daughters. Her business is the sale of women’s underwear and nightgowns. Her husband and son help her to source her products. They bring them from the wholesale market in Istaravshan. Barno would like to take out a loan to increase her spring-summer selection. Her business has increased during the time that she has been a borrower since 2007. Barno is one of the good clients of MicroInvest.

Translated from Russian by Sabina Holzman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase underwear and nightgowns for sale

loans.name: Konsulo

texts.ru: Консуло – 35 лет. Она замужем и мать 4-х детей. Её мж уехал в Россию работать. Здесь он не смог найти хорошую работу, чтобы накопить денег и купить для себя скот. У Консулло было всего лишь 4 барана. Но недавно она узнала о кредитовании нашей организации, и пришла брать кредит для покупки одной дойной коровы. Консулло будет доить молоко и давать детям. Если останется она будет продавать. Пока ее муж найдет работу в России и пришлет ей деньги, ей будет помогать ее брат.
texts.en:
Konsulo is 35 years old. She is married and the mother of 4 children. Her husband went to Russia for work. Here he could not find a good job that would allow him to save money and purchase livestock for himself. Konsulo only had 4 sheep, but recently she found out about credit from our organization and came to take out a loan for the purchase of one dairy cow. Konsulo will milk the cow and give the milk to her children. If there are leftovers, she will sell them. Until her husband finds a job in Russia and sends money, her brother will help her.

Translated from Russian by Sabina Holzman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase a dairy cow

loans.name: Tochiniso

texts.ru: Точинисо 44 лет. Она вдова. Её муж умер 5 лет назад. Она осталась с 4-мя детьми. От мужа ей осталось небольшое стадо овец. Сейчас стадо пасет ее старший сын. Сыну 25 лет. Он еще не женат. Для женитьбы ему надо много денег, но пока их деньги хватает только на жизнь. Сын хотел уехать в Россию, но Точинисо отговорила его, и сказала, чтобы он хорошо работал этим летом, занимаясь купле – продажей скота, и осенью они сыграют свадьбу. Точинисо решила помочь своему сыну с помощью кредита. За счет кредита она купит ему еще несколько овец.
texts.en:
Tochiniso is 44 years old. She is a widow. Her husband passed away fives years ago and she is left with four children. Her husband left her a small amount of sheep. Today her son shepherds the herd. Her son is 25 years old and not married yet. He needs a lot of money to get married, but at this time the money is only enough for their life. He wanted to go to Russia, but Tochiniso has convinced him not too and told him that he needs to work hard this summer by buying and selling cattle, and in the fall he can have a wedding. Tochiniso decided to help her son by taking out a loan. This loan will let him buy a few more sheep.

Translated from Russian by Elena Fedorchuk, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To buy sheep

loans.name: Inobatchon

texts.ru:
Инобатчон женщина 25 лет, замужем , имеет двоих детей. Она занимается  бизнесом продажи косметики. Товар привозит с Истаравшана, а также её поставляют поставщики. Инобатчон  имеет одну дочь и сына, они учатся в лицее- гимназии города Худжанда.
Её муж работает мастером по ремонту автомобилей. Он хорошо зарабатывал, но сейчас поток клиентов уменьшился, и его доход значительно, недостаточен для проживания семьи. Поэтому, Инобатчон хочет в кредит увеличить свой оборотный капитал, бизнес
texts.en:
Inobatchon is a 25 year old woman, she is married and has two children. She is in the business of selling cosmetic products. She buys the merchandise in Istaravshan and also from her suppliers. Inobatchon has one daughter and one son, they are studying at the lyceum-grammar school in the town of Khudjand. Her husband works as an auto repairman. He was making good money, but at this time he does not have so many customers and his income is noticeably not enough to sustain the family. This is why Inobatchon wants to use the loan to increase her business working capital.

Translated from Russian by Elena Fedorchuk, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: To increase working capital

loans.name: Hotamchon

texts.ru:
Хотамчону 32 года. Женат и отец 2-х детей. Его жена работает учительницей в их сельской школе. Её дети тоже идут в эту школу. Она учитель начальных классов. Зарплата учителей совсем маленкая, но жена Хотамчона все равно ходит на работу, чтобы учить сельских детей. Хотамчон, после 2-х лет кредитования в нашей организации увеличил свой капитал  и купил себе машину.
Сейчас у него закончились наличные деньги, и он взял кредит, чтобы купить еще одну партию молодых овец.
texts.en:
Hotamchon is 32 years old. He is married and a father of two children. His wife works as a teacher in their village school. Her children will also go to this school. She is a teacher of the elementary grades. The teacher's salary is very small, but Hotamchon's wife still goes to work to teach the village children. Hotamchon has increased his working capital and bought a car after two years of taking out loans at our organization. Right now he is low on cash and took out a loan to buy a couple of more young sheep.

Translated from Russian by Elena Fedorchuk, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Feeding and selling of cattle and prosesing of milk

loans.name: Sharofat

texts.ru: Сулаймонова  Шарофат 37 летняя женщина, мать троих детей, занимается продажей мелкого ассортимента товаров ( носки, колготки, нижнее бельё ). Муж работает водителем городского маршрутного такси. Его заработная плата хватает на минимальное проживание. Поэтому ему помогает его жена , своим доходом от бизнеса. Шарофат  сама ездит в Бишкек и привозит товар по оптовым расценкам. Также продаёт по цене ниже , чем у других продавцов. Исходя из этого у неё много клиентов, которые закупают товар крупными партиями, кроме этого Шарофат продаёт товар и в розницу.  Для увеличения бизнеса , она решила получить  кредит в Микроинвесте.
texts.en:
Sharofat S. is a 37 year old woman, the mother of three children and sells a small assortment of products (socks, pantyhose, underwear). Her husband works as a driver of a city minibus. His salary is only enough for minimal survival. This is why his wife helps with the income from her business. Sharofat travels by herself to Bishkek and brings back products at wholesale prices. She also sells her products at lower prices than those of other sellers. Because of this, she has a lot of customers who purchase her products in large quantities. In addition, Sharofat sells her products individually. In order to grow her business, she decided to get a loan from MicroInvest.

Translated from Russian by Sabina Holzman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase products for sale

loans.name: Erkin

texts.ru: Эркин Рузиева – женщина 44 лет. Замужем и мать 3-х детей. Она наша давняя клиентка. Уже четыре года, как она у нас кредитуется. 4 года назад она начинала с уличной торговли возле школы. У нее был маленький столик, на котором она продавала несколько тетрадей разных видов и ручки. Сейчас у нее есть канцелярская лавка на рынке «Фаровон» города Гафурова. Товар ей привозит фирма, которая занимается импортом канцтоваров. В будущем Эркин планирует расширять бизнес, и открыть свой канцелярский магазин в центре города Гафурова.
texts.en:
Erkin R. is a 44 year old woman. She is married and is the mother of 3 children. She is a long-term client. She has been a borrower for four years now. 4 years ago she started from street sales near a school. Erkin had a small table on which she sold several kinds of notebooks and pens. Now she has a school supply stall and the “Farovon” market in Gafurov. A firm that specializes in the import of school supplies brings her the products. In the future Erkin plans to grow her business and to open her own school supply store in the center of Gafurov.

Translated from Russian by Sabina Holzman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Sale of school supplies

loans.name: Zulayho

texts.ru: Зулайхо- постоянный клиент Микроинвест, которая использует кредит для увеличения своего бизнеса. Она торгует на рынке «Сомониён» города Худжанда, домашними тапочками. Она товар привозит с Истаравшана. Кредитуется она с 2007 года, она считает , что на один месяц её выгодней. Поэтому у неё кредитная история в основном на один месяц или на два. Её муж помогает её по завозу товаров. Следующий кредит она хочет использовать для привоза нового ассортимента тапочек с Китая.
texts.en:
Zulayho is a regular client of MicroInvest who uses her credit to expand her business. She sells house slippers at the “Somonien” market in Khujand. Zulayho brings her products from Istaravshan. She has been a borrower since 2007 and believes that a one month loan is more profitable for her. This is why her credit history is primarily for one month or two. Her husband helps her to purchase products. She would like to use her next loan in order to bring in an assortment of slippers from China.

Translated from Russian by Sabina Holzman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase slippers

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn L. is managing a small sari-sari (variety) store. She is 53 years old and already a widow with four children. Aside from having a store, she supplements her income by raising pigs. Currently, she has four sows and two other pigs. She also owns farm equipment like a thresher, which she uses to earn additional income for the family.

She is requesting a loan of Php 15,000 from CEVI, Kiva's partner. She will use the loan to buy more merchandise for her store. The loan will help Evelyn attract more customers and improve her sales. She wants to grow her store, which she started 10 years ago.

CEVI is a non-profit organization and a partner of WorldVision Philippines. It is organized to reach out to more people, especially the poor, to start and have their own business. CEVI provides not only credit but training and insurance coverage as well.

loans.use: To purchase additional stock for her sari-sari (variety) store

loans.name: Akmal

texts.ru: Акмал - молодой человек 21 лет. Еще не женат. Он студент 4-го курса Таджиксктго Государственного Университета. Он учится на экономиста. Но пока, для оплаты своей учебы он должен работать и зарабатывать деньги.  А также в следующем году он собирается жениться. Отец и мать работают в государственном учреждении. Зарплата у них небольшая. Поэтому, Акмал откармливает скот на своей даче. За два года кредитования Акмал увеличил количество своего скота и свою прибыль. Он очень благодарен нашей организации за помощь в его бизнесе.
texts.en:
Akmal is a young 21 year old man. He is not married yet. He is a 4th year student at the Tajik Public University. He is studying to be an economist. For now, in order to pay for his studies he needs to work and earn money. Also, he plans to get married next year. His father and mother work in a government organization. They have small salaries. This is why Akmal raises livestock at his summer home (dacha). Over two years as a borrower, Akmal has increased his livestock count and profits. He is very grateful to our organization for help with his business.

Translated from Russian by Sabina Holzman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Raise livestock

loans.name: Yusufjon

texts.ru: Юсуфчону 35 лет.Он женат и уже имеет 5-ро детей. Его жена нигде не работает. Она сидит дома и делает домашнюю работу, нянчит детей и по мере возможности кормит скот. Юсуфчон занимается откормом и продажей скота. Начало весны для Юсуфчона – это сезон закупа скота, потому, что скот сейчас стоит дешево. И для откорма скота не надо много тратиться. Скот ест горную траву, и Юсуфчон не покупает для скота сено. Через 4 месяца наступает священный месяц Рамазан, и городские люди начинают покупать скот. Вот тогда, Юсуфчон продаст свой скот.
texts.en:
Yusufjon is 35 years old. He is married and already has 5 children. His wife does not have a job. She stays at home and takes care of the house, raises the children and feeds the livestock when she is able. Yusufjon fattens and sells livestock. The start of spring is the season for purchasing livestock for Yusufjon, because it is currently cheap. He also does not need to spend a lot to fatten the livestock. The livestock eats mountain grass and Yusufjon does not purchase hay for it. In 4 months starts the holy month of Ramadan and city residents start to purchase livestock. Then Yusufjon will sell his livestock.

Translated from Russian by Sabina Holzman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Purchase livestock

loans.name: Ahror

texts.ru: Акилов Ахрор мужчина 34 лет , женат имеет двоих детей. Он занимается бизнесом продажи видеокассет и дисков. Его ассортимент  с каждым кредитом увеличивается новыми кинофильмами и концертами. Следующий кредит он также хочет использовать для закупа товара. Он берёт займ в Микроинвест уже второй год. Его мини маркет расположен в центре Худжанда , поэтому у него хороший поток клиентов. Ахрор благодарит KIVA за сотрудничество.
texts.en:
Ahror A. is a 34 year old man, he is married and has two children. He sells videotapes and CDs. His product assortment increases with every loan with new movies and concerts. He would also like to use his next loan to purchase products. This is the second year that he is taking a loan from MicroInvest. His minimarket is located in the center of Khujand and this is why he has a good stream of customers. Ahror is grateful to KIVA for its partnership.

Translated from Russian by Sabina Holzman, Kiva Volunteer

loans.use: Sale of videotapes

loans.name: Soldie

texts.en:
Soldie D. is a sari-sari (variety) store owner. She is 46 years old and has three children who are studying. She started her business a year ago using her small savings. Until now, she was able to sustain her business and make it grow. When Soldie is not busy selling goods, she helps her husband, Marcelino, on their farm. They grow rice together, which they use to feed and support their family.

She is requesting a loan of Php 10,000 from CEVI, Kiva's partner. She will use the loan to buy additional merchandise to grow her business. She is also interested in venturing into some other line of business to augment their income.
